dublin_core.dcvalue: Perhaps not according to experts involved with a new e health initiative aimed at beefing up the research base for e health development Sponsors are aiming to go a long way towards bridging that gap and they plan to produce in a very short period of time an array of tools that health care organizations can make use of right away particularly with respect to chronic DM Learn more about what researchers are tackling in this initiative and how it might help your organization s e health plans
Initiative gives a boost to e-health development and research.
